page.title: 09 A Typical Saturday.
page.content: Every Saturday morning I get up and brush my teeth.I put my tap dancing kit n and put a track-suit on top,I go down-stairs for my breakfast.I go into my shop.My dad usually tells me to get ready in half an hour.I go upstairs and brush my teeth again.My Dad calls me and I run to our shop,kiss my Mum good-bye and go and wait by our car.My Dad drives me to Beccles for my dancing lessons.After about three quarters of an hour I am finished.My house is a four bedroom house.I play out till 1.00 then I have lunch,(A cheese sandwich). Then I take my dog for a walk.I have my tea at 6.00.then I go to bed at about 10.00.
